text: Albert Schumberg (19 April 1909 - 16 January 1967) was a German swimmer. He competed in the men's 100 metre backstroke event at the 1928 Summer Olympics. ==References== Category:1909 births Category:1967 deaths Category:German male swimmers Category:Olympic swimmers of Germany Category:Swimmers at the 1928 Summer Olympics Category:Sportspeople from Kiel Category:Male backstroke swimmers
title: Albert Schumberg
